mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Wagon Wheels", "Follow the Leader", and "Be a Hero". ROUND DANCES "Strawberry Blonde", and "Sunshine". SPECIAL FEATURES "St. Louis Is the Place", "Asilomar, 1957", "Spotlight: A Canadian Caller", "Tri-State Council in Benkelman", and "Square Dancing - Continental". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Paging the Roundancers (Hamiltons)", "Style Series: Wagon Wheel Variations", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Women on the Square", "The Square of the Month (Jim Brooks)", "'Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
